name: Millie's Messenger
description: Millie's Messenger is a live messenging app that can be used as a template for incorporating Socket.IO, MongoDB Change Streams, Express, React.js, Node.js and JSON Web Tokens/ Bearer Authorization. To test live site, login with username: Test  password: testuser

name: FotoBook
description: A social media MERN app with login/ authorization, profiles, posting, commenting, and editing functionality. User can post images and save images to a profile that will display on the explore page to other users. To test live site, login with username: Test  password: testuser

name: HAPI Hour
description: An app built with React.js to help users find drink recipes from thecocktaildb API. User can search by name/ phrase, search by ingredient, choose a random drink, or start with a base ingredient choice and browse.
